com.taobao.datax.engine.schedule
类 JarLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      com.taobao.datax.engine.schedule.JarLoader

public class JarLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

A special class to load the jar file.

ClassLoader

方法摘要

          Find Class Object through the name if exists.

方法详细信息

findClass

public java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Find Class Object through the name if exists.

覆盖：
类 java.lang.ClassLoader 中的 findClass
参数：
name - name of class.
返回：
resultClass the founded Class Object.
抛出：
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

loadClassData

public byte[] loadClassData(java.lang.String classname)
                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
LoadClassData from the appointed class to a byte array.

参数：
classname - name of class.
返回：
byte[] the data which loaded from the class.
抛出：
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the appointed class is not founded.
